title: Chocolate Brownies with Cherries
ingredients: ['100g dark chocolate', '100g salted butter', '200g caster sugar, sifted', '3 eggs', '1 vanilla pod, seeds only', '125g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '4 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '200g tinned cherries, drained', '200g dark chocolate chips']
